verses.verse: In the five <S%H2568><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of our captivity <S%H1546><s%>, in the beginning <S%H7218><s%> of the year <S%H8141><s%>, in the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, in the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> after <S%H310><s%> that the city <S%H5892><s%> was smitten <S%H5221><s%>, in the selfsame <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was upon me <S%H935><s%>, and he brought me thither.

In the visions <S%H4759><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> he me into the land <S%H776><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and set <S%H5117><s%> me down upon a very <S%H3966><s%> high <S%H1364><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>, whereon was as it were the frame <S%H4011><s%> of a city <S%H5892><s%> on the south <S%H5045><s%>.

And he brought <S%H935><s%> me thither <S%H376><s%>; and, behold, there was a man, whose appearance <S%H4758><s%> was like the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>, with a line <S%H6616><s%> of flax <S%H6593><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and a measuring <S%H4060><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%>; and he stood <S%H5975><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%>.

And the man <S%H376><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Son of man <S%H120><s%>, behold <S%H7200><s%> with thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%> with thine ears <S%H241><s%>, and set <S%H7760><s%> thy heart <S%H3820><s%> upon all that I shall show <S%H7200><s%> thee <S%H4616><s%>; for, to the intent that I may show <S%H7200><s%> them unto thee <S%H935><s%>, art thou brought hither <S%H5046><s%>: declare all that thou seest <S%H7200><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And <S%H2346><s%>, behold, a wall on the outside <S%H2351><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and in the man <S%H376><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%> a measuring <S%H4060><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long <S%H520><s%>, of a cubit and a handbreadth <S%H2948><s%> each <S%H4058><s%>: so he measured the thickness <S%H2948><s%> of the building <S%H1146><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%>; and the height <S%H6967><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%>.

Then came <S%H935><s%> he unto the gate <S%H8179><s%> which looketh <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the east <S%H6921><s%>, and went up <S%H5927><s%> the steps <S%H4609><s%> thereof <S%H4058><s%>: and he measured the threshold <S%H5592><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%>; and the other <S%H259><s%> threshold <S%H5592><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%>.

And every lodge <S%H8372><s%> was one <S%H259><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> long <S%H753><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%>; and the space between the lodges <S%H8372><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>; and the threshold <S%H5592><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> by <S%H681><s%> the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> toward <S%H1004><s%> the house was one <S%H259><s%> reed <S%H7070><s%>.
He measured <S%H4058><s%> also the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> toward <S%H1004><s%> the house <S%H259><s%>, one reed <S%H7070><s%>.

Then measured <S%H4058><s%> he the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%>, eight <S%H8083><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>; and the posts <S%H352><s%> thereof <S%H8147><s%>, two cubits <S%H520><s%>; and the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> was toward the house <S%H1004><s%>.

And the lodges <S%H8372><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> eastward <S%H1870><s%> were three <S%H7969><s%> on this side <S%H6311><s%>, and three <S%H7969><s%> on that side <S%H6311><s%>; they three <S%H7969><s%> were of one <S%H259><s%> measure <S%H4060><s%>: and the posts <S%H352><s%> had one <S%H259><s%> measure on this side and on that side <S%H4060><s%>.

And he measured <S%H4058><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of the opening <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%>, ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>; and the length <S%H753><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%>, thirteen <S%H7969><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>;

and a border <S%H1366><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the lodges <S%H8372><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> cubit <S%H520><s%> on this side <S%H1366><s%>, and a border, one cubit <S%H520><s%> on that side <S%H8372><s%>; and the lodges, six <S%H8337><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> on this side <S%H8337><s%>, and six cubits on that side <S%H520><s%>.

And he measured <S%H4058><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> from the roof <S%H1406><s%> of the one lodge <S%H8372><s%> to the roof <S%H1406><s%> of the other <S%H7341><s%>, a breadth of five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>; door <S%H6607><s%> against door <S%H6607><s%>.

He made <S%H6213><s%> also posts <S%H352><s%>, threescore <S%H8346><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>; and the court <S%H2691><s%> reached unto the posts <S%H352><s%>, round about <S%H5439><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%>.

And from the forefront <S%H6440><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> at the entrance <S%H2978><s%> unto the forefront <S%H6440><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> were fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

And there were closed <S%H331><s%> windows <S%H2474><s%> to the lodges <S%H8372><s%>, and to their posts <S%H352><s%> within <S%H6441><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and likewise to the arches <S%H361><s%>; and windows <S%H2474><s%> were round about <S%H5439><s%> inward <S%H6441><s%>; and upon each post <S%H352><s%> were palm-trees <S%H8561><s%>.

Then brought <S%H935><s%> he me into the outer <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>; and <S%H3957><s%>, lo, there were chambers and a pavement <S%H7531><s%>, made <S%H6213><s%> for the court <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>: thirty <S%H7970><s%> chambers <S%H3957><s%> were upon the pavement <S%H7531><s%>.

And the pavement <S%H7531><s%> was by the side <S%H3802><s%> of the gates <S%H8179><s%>, answerable <S%H5980><s%> unto the length <S%H753><s%> of the gates <S%H8179><s%>, even the lower <S%H8481><s%> pavement <S%H7531><s%>.

Then he measured <S%H4058><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> from the forefront <S%H6440><s%> of the lower <S%H8481><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> unto the forefront <S%H6440><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> without <S%H2351><s%>, a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, both on the east <S%H6921><s%> and on the north <S%H6828><s%>.

And the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the outer <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> whose prospect <S%H6440><s%> is toward <S%H1870><s%> the north <S%H6828><s%>, he measured <S%H4058><s%> the length <S%H753><s%> thereof and the breadth thereof <S%H7341><s%>.

And the lodges <S%H8372><s%> thereof were three <S%H7969><s%> on this side and three <S%H7969><s%> on that side <S%H352><s%>; and the posts thereof and the arches <S%H361><s%> thereof were after the measure <S%H4060><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>: the length <S%H753><s%> thereof was fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

And the windows <S%H2474><s%> thereof <S%H361><s%>, and the arches thereof <S%H8561><s%>, and the palm-trees thereof <S%H4060><s%>, were after the measure of the gate <S%H8179><s%> whose prospect <S%H6440><s%> is toward <S%H1870><s%> the east <S%H6921><s%>; and they went up <S%H5927><s%> unto it by seven <S%H7651><s%> steps <S%H4609><s%>; and the arches <S%H361><s%> thereof were before them <S%H6440><s%>.

And there was a gate <S%H8179><s%> to the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> over against the other gate <S%H8179><s%>, both on the north <S%H6828><s%> and on the east <S%H6921><s%>; and he measured <S%H4058><s%> from gate <S%H8179><s%> to gate <S%H8179><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

And he led <S%H3212><s%> me toward <S%H1870><s%> the south <S%H1864><s%>; and <S%H8179><s%>, behold, a gate toward <S%H1870><s%> the south <S%H1864><s%>: and he measured <S%H4058><s%> the posts <S%H352><s%> thereof and the arches <S%H361><s%> thereof according to these measures <S%H4060><s%>.

And there were windows <S%H2474><s%> in it and in the arches <S%H361><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%>, like those windows <S%H2474><s%>: the length <S%H753><s%> was fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

And there were seven <S%H7651><s%> steps <S%H4609><s%> to go up <S%H5930><s%> to it <S%H361><s%>, and the arches thereof were before <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H8561><s%>; and it had palm-trees, one <S%H259><s%> on this side <S%H259><s%>, and another on that side <S%H352><s%>, upon the posts thereof.

And there was a gate <S%H8179><s%> to the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the south <S%H1864><s%>: and he measured <S%H4058><s%> from gate <S%H8179><s%> to gate <S%H8179><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the south <S%H1864><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

Then he brought <S%H935><s%> me to the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> by the south <S%H1864><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>: and he measured <S%H4058><s%> the south <S%H1864><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> according to these measures <S%H4060><s%>;

and the lodges <S%H8372><s%> thereof <S%H352><s%>, and the posts thereof <S%H361><s%>, and the arches thereof <S%H4060><s%>, according to these measures: and there were windows <S%H2474><s%> in it and in the arches <S%H361><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%>; it was fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long <S%H753><s%>, and five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%>.

And there were arches <S%H361><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long <S%H753><s%>, and five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%>.

And the arches <S%H361><s%> thereof were toward the outer <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>; and palm-trees <S%H8561><s%> were upon the posts <S%H352><s%> thereof <S%H4608><s%>: and the ascent to it had eight <S%H8083><s%> steps <S%H4609><s%>.

And he brought <S%H935><s%> me into the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the east <S%H6921><s%>: and he measured <S%H4058><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> according to these measures <S%H4060><s%>;

and the lodges <S%H8372><s%> thereof <S%H352><s%>, and the posts thereof <S%H361><s%>, and the arches thereof <S%H4060><s%>, according to these measures: and there were windows <S%H2474><s%> therein and in the arches <S%H361><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%>; it was fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long <S%H753><s%>, and five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%>.

And the arches <S%H361><s%> thereof were toward the outer <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>; and palm-trees <S%H8561><s%> were upon the posts <S%H352><s%> thereof <S%H4608><s%>, on this side, and on that side: and the ascent to it had eight <S%H8083><s%> steps <S%H4609><s%>.
And he brought <S%H935><s%> me to the north <S%H6828><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>: and he measured <S%H4058><s%> it according to these measures <S%H4060><s%>;

the lodges <S%H8372><s%> thereof <S%H352><s%>, the posts thereof <S%H361><s%>, and the arches thereof <S%H2474><s%>: and there were windows therein round about <S%H5439><s%>; the length <S%H753><s%> was fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>.

And the posts <S%H352><s%> thereof were toward the outer <S%H2435><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>; and palm-trees <S%H8561><s%> were upon the posts <S%H352><s%> thereof <S%H4608><s%>, on this side, and on that side: and the ascent to it had eight <S%H8083><s%> steps <S%H4609><s%>.
And a chamber <S%H3957><s%> with the door <S%H6607><s%> thereof was by the posts <S%H352><s%> at the gates <S%H8179><s%>; there they washed <S%H1740><s%> the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>.

And in the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> were two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H7979><s%> on this side <S%H7979><s%>, and two tables on that side <S%H7819><s%>, to slay thereon the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> and the sin-offering <S%H2403><s%> and the trespass-offering <S%H817><s%>.

And on the one side <S%H3802><s%> without <S%H2351><s%>, as one goeth up <S%H5927><s%> to the entry <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%>, were two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H7979><s%>; and on the other <S%H312><s%> side <S%H3802><s%>, which belonged to the porch <S%H197><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%>, were two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H7979><s%>.

Four <S%H702><s%> tables <S%H7979><s%> were on this side <S%H702><s%>, and four tables <S%H7979><s%> on that side <S%H3802><s%>, by the side of the gate <S%H8179><s%>; eight <S%H8083><s%> tables <S%H7979><s%>, whereupon they slew the sacrifices <S%H7819><s%>.

And there were four <S%H702><s%> tables <S%H7979><s%> for the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, of hewn <S%H1496><s%> stone <S%H68><s%>, a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> long <S%H753><s%>, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> cubit <S%H520><s%> high <S%H1363><s%>; whereupon they laid <S%H3240><s%> the instruments <S%H3627><s%> wherewith they slew <S%H7819><s%> the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> and the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>.

And the hooks <S%H8240><s%>, a <S%H259><s%> handbreadth <S%H2948><s%> long <S%H3559><s%>, were fastened within <S%H1004><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>: and upon the tables <S%H7979><s%> was the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the oblation <S%H7133><s%>.

And without <S%H2351><s%> the inner <S%H6442><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> were chambers <S%H3957><s%> for the singers <S%H7891><s%> in the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%>, which was at the side <S%H3802><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>; and their prospect <S%H6440><s%> was toward <S%H1870><s%> the south <S%H1864><s%>; one <S%H259><s%> at the side <S%H3802><s%> of the east <S%H6921><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> having the prospect <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the north <S%H6828><s%>.

And he said <S%H1696><s%> unto me <S%H2090><s%>, This chamber <S%H3957><s%>, whose prospect <S%H6440><s%> is toward <S%H1870><s%> the south <S%H1864><s%>, is for the priests <S%H3548><s%>, the keepers <S%H8104><s%> of the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>;

and the chamber <S%H3957><s%> whose prospect <S%H6440><s%> is toward <S%H1870><s%> the north <S%H6828><s%> is for the priests <S%H3548><s%>, the keepers <S%H8104><s%> of the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>: these are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zadok <S%H6659><s%>, who from among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> come near <S%H7131><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> to minister unto him <S%H8334><s%>.

And he measured <S%H4058><s%> the court <S%H2691><s%>, a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> long <S%H753><s%>, and a hundred <S%H3967><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> broad <S%H7341><s%>, foursquare <S%H7251><s%>; and the altar <S%H4196><s%> was before <S%H6440><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%>.

Then he brought <S%H935><s%> me to the porch <S%H197><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, and measured <S%H4058><s%> each post <S%H352><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%>, five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> on this side <S%H2568><s%>, and five cubits <S%H520><s%> on that side <S%H7341><s%>: and the breadth of the gate <S%H8179><s%> was three <S%H7969><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> on this side <S%H7969><s%>, and three cubits on that side <S%H520><s%>.

The length <S%H753><s%> of the porch <S%H197><s%> was twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>, and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> eleven <S%H6249><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%>; even by the steps <S%H4609><s%> whereby they went up <S%H5927><s%> to it <S%H5982><s%>: and there were pillars by the posts <S%H352><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> on this side <S%H259><s%>, and another on that side.
